an1.278-286:4.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen that two wheel-turning monarchs could arise in the same solar system at the same time.
an1.278-286:4.3: But it is possible that just one wheel-turning monarch could arise in one solar system.
an1.278-286:6.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen that a woman could be a Perfect One, a fully awakened Buddha.
an1.278-286:6.3: But it is possible that a man could be a Perfect One, a fully awakened Buddha.
an1.278-286:8.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen that a woman could be a wheel-turning monarch.
an1.278-286:8.3: But it is possible that a man could be a wheel-turning monarch.
an1.278-286:10.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen that a woman could become Sakka … Māra … Brahmā.
an1.278-286:10.3: But it is possible that a man could become Sakka … Māra … Brahmā.
an1.278-286:12.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen that a likable, desirable, agreeable result could come from bad bodily conduct.
an1.278-286:12.3: But it is possible that an unlikable, undesirable, disagreeable result could come from bad bodily conduct.
an1.278-286:14.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen that a likable, desirable, agreeable result could come from bad verbal or mental conduct.
an1.278-286:14.3: But it is possible that an unlikable, undesirable, disagreeable result could come from bad verbal or mental conduct.
